thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 23 of 533
thread.title: Kimberly Breitfuss

author: Kimberly Breitfuss
title: Kimberly Breitfuss
text:
I love this line of casual/yoga wear. Great quality and deals. I work from home and love looking hot for my hubby while being comfortable. I have even dressed up some of the leggings with hills and a fancy top for a nite on the town. The cut out and different styles you can't find anywhere! Returns are easy and they actually have a customer service # to call if you have any questions. Love them and will continue to order.
Sincerely and honesly Kimberly
